title: web museum of wood types
content:
I recently finished re-designing our web museum of wood types.  
Web Museum is established for the purpose of educating the general public, and the next generation, on the beauties of wood types and engraved blocks. Our mission is to gather, save, preserve, and interpret wood types and information about them.

[http://www.unicorngraphics.com/wood%20type%20museum.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20090501215106/http:/www.unicorngraphics.com/wood%20type%20museum.asp "http://www.unicorngraphics.com/wood%20type%20museum.asp")
author: unicorngraphics

comments.content: Indeed, _Thank you_. Being able to see those catalogs page by page is wonderful. Kudos!
Very interesting. I can see wasting hours perusing. Thank you!
